mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id AS menu_id,m.parent_id,m.name,url,m.type,m.icon,m.order_num FROM tz_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN tz_sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN tz_sys_menu m ON m.`menu_id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.type != 2 order by order_num
select * from tz_sys_menu where `type` != 2 order by order_num
